ai-patthana22.5:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.5:0.3_0: And the scratching his limbs are flashing.
ai-patthana22.5:1.1_0: skilled in the teaching of the unskillful.
ai-patthana22.5:1.1_1: supported by the support of the six basis, he made up the six sense fields.
ai-patthana22.5:1.1_2: said that the sound of conditioned phenomena is found.
ai-patthana22.5:2.1_0: Not skilled in the undeclared points, the causes and reasons to understand the teaching that arises conditioned by not grasping.
ai-patthana22.5:3.1_0: skilled in the teaching of the skillful, not the support of the skillful, and the support of the teaching.
ai-patthana22.5:3.1_1: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-patthana22.5:4.1_0: Not skilled in the ways of revealing the unskillful qualities that make them hard to comprehend.
ai-patthana22.5:5.1_0: Not skilled in the undeclared points, the causes arises conditioned by not grasping.
ai-patthana22.5:6.1_0: Nor does one who has declared the unskillful.
ai-patthana22.5:7.1_0: Nor does one who has declared: ‘This is a cause of the unskillful.
ai-patthana22.5:8.1_0: Not reciting the unskilled in the unskillful.
ai-patthana22.5:9.1_0: They don’t see the Truth with the unskilled in the skillful, the cause and reason for the reason.
ai-patthana22.5:9.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the undeclared points.
ai-patthana22.5:9.1_2: (These six discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-patthana22.5:10.1_0: Not understanding the unskillful qualities that arise from the unskillful, or anything else.
ai-patthana22.5:11.1_0: Not known by the unskillful, they don’t see anything known by the mind.
